elements.name: panel4
elements.title: Assign the individual descriptions to the appropriate subject areas. N.B.: The number of descriptions will not be the same for every subject area.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Subject area: What is my own role?
choices: What arguments and counter-arguments can be found?
What is important to the other party?
What in particular should I be aware of?
It's 8 am on Monday morning.
What topics should be addressed in the discussion?
What do I want to achieve?
What compromises am I prepared to make?
I tend more to be objective and not emotional.
What is the most important thing about the solution for me?
Is there a fixed allocation of roles in this conversation?
What challenges could occur during the discussion?
What is my relationship with the parties involved?
What language does the other person speak and understand?
What are my interlocutor's reasons for the discussion?
What is good about the relationship with the other party, and what is more likely to be problematic?
How do I want to influence the conversation?
How much influence can I exert on the discussion process?
correctAnswer: Is there a fixed allocation of roles in this conversation?
How do I want to influence the conversation?
How much influence can I exert on the discussion process?
